original_title: Serengeti Life: The Animal World of Africa
overview: Instead of inundating you with facts overlaid on a voice-over narration, "Serengeti Life" boasts a gorgeous classical score -- including such tracks as "Slavic Dance" by Bedrich Smetana, "Habanera" by Georges Bizet and "Bolero" by Maurice Ravel -- that plays over a collage of wildlife scenes. Viewers are encouraged to sit back, relax and enjoy the animals, which range from birds and turtles to giraffes and elephants in their natural habitat.
title: Serengeti Life: The Animal World of Africa
